definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Karamanlis said that Greece attaches great importance to developing relations with China.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉曼利斯说，希方重视发展对华关系。

sentences.english: Both R3 and R4 had no significant effect on enhancing the growth and differentiation of D.
sentences.chinese: R3和R4对华石斛生长和分化无明显的促进效果。

sentences.english: Argentina's trade balance with China swung into a deficit in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷对华贸易差额在2008年转为逆差。

sentences.english: This week, he also got tough on trade with China.
sentences.chinese: 本周，他也采取了强硬的对华贸易政策。

sentences.english: What adjustment do you think the new UK Government will make to UK-China relations?
sentences.chinese: 你认为新政府将在哪些方面调整对华关系？

sentences.english: In this context they discussed the issue of the EU arms embargo against China.
sentences.chinese: 在此背景下，双方讨论了欧盟对华军售禁令问题。

sentences.english: This is not a time to let paranoia chart the course for U.S. policy toward China.
sentences.chinese: 现在决不能让偏执观念左右美国的对华政策。

sentences.english: Kaparo said to actively develop relations with China is Kenya's persistent position.
sentences.chinese: 卡帕罗说，积极发展对华关系是肯方的一贯立场。

sentences.english: The EU attaches great importance to developing relations with China and China will respond to EU's initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟重视发展对华关系，中方愿对此作出积极响应。

sentences.english: Bross says American mistrust of Huawei eventually will go away.
sentences.chinese: 布罗斯说美国对华为的不信任最终将会不复存在。

sentences.english: Ideological War is a major component of Japan's all-round war against China.
sentences.chinese: “思想战”是日本对华“总体战”的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: S. America sold $92 billion in goods and services to China last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，美国对华商品和服务销售总额达920亿美元。

sentences.english: My mother, who does not tweet, also remarked on Watson’s speed.
sentences.chinese: 我不会发推的妈妈也对华生的速度记忆犹新。

sentences.english: This is America's 2010 "double inverse" survey first.
sentences.chinese: 这是2010年美国对华“双反”调查第一案。

sentences.english: Senator Kyl has been Huawei’s most vocal critic in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 参议员凯尔在华盛顿对华为的批评最为激烈。

sentences.english: China- bashers have introduced a dozen bills in the new Congress.
sentences.chinese: “对华强硬派”议员已经向国会提交了十二分议案。

definition: within China/during one's visit to China
